description: Numbers that are congruent to {3, 5, 6} mod 8.
comments: Also, numbers n such that Fibonacci(n) = 2 (mod 3), where Fibonacci = A000045. - _M. F. Hasler_, Sep 29 2012
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
